tool_description: Official WhatsApp Business API. Message services officially offered by WhatsApp. For reach WhatsApi Token contact to info@collectapi.com
title: WhatsApp Business

api_list.name: /settings/backup
api_list.description: Service that export Whatsapp Bussiness Settings.

api_list.name: /settings/business/about
api_list.description: Service that update Whatsapp Bussiness About.

api_list.name: /settings/business/about
api_list.description: Service that get Whatsapp Bussiness About.

api_list.name: /settings/business/photo
api_list.description: Service that update Whatsapp Bussiness profile photo.

api_list.name: /settings/business/photo
api_list.description: Service that get Whatsapp Bussiness profile photo.

api_list.name: /settings/business/profile
api_list.description: Service that update Whatsapp Bussiness settings.

api_list.name: /settings/business/profile
api_list.description: Service that get Whatsapp Bussiness settings.

api_list.name: /settings/restore
api_list.description: Service that import Whatsapp Bussiness Settings.

api_list.name: messages
api_list.description: Service that sends messages to people in whatsapp.

api_list.name: /settings/backup
api_list.description: Service that export Whatsapp Bussiness Settings.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-business.p.rapidapi.com/settings/backup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-business.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
